visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals

items.headline: This course sets out a step-by-step approach covering the fundamental steps required to identify, manage, and mitigate.
objectives_summary: Discover the processes used in the management of operational risk.
Identify the different types of operational risks.
Explore the methods used in identifying and evaluating the different operational risks.

Explore each of these risk categories, what they are and what causes them.
